question: Why did Tea Cake encourage Janie to work with him in the fields?
answer: Tea Cake encouraged Janie to work with him in the fields because he got lonesome without her during the workday. He had been leaving work to come home and see her at odd hours, losing work time. He wanted her with him so they could be together all day rather than being separated.
